    • Method Detail

      • hint

        public boolean hint()
        Description copied from class: Solver
        Highlights a safe/recommended move to the user.
        Specified by:
        hint in class Solver
        Returns:
        True if a hint (one that has not already been hinted) is found. False if no hint or futher hints are found.

      • assist

        public boolean assist()
        Description copied from class: Solver
        Probe a safe/recommended cell.
        Specified by:
        assist in class Solver
        Returns:
        True if a cell is found and probed. False if no safe cell is found and probed.

      • solve

        public void solve()
        Description copied from class: Solver
        Probe all safe/recommended cells present on the board. Stop when no more safe/recommended moves can be found. Basically repeatably calls the assist method.
        Specified by:
        solve in class Solver

      • isSinglePointSafe

        private boolean isSinglePointSafe(Cell cell)
        Checks if the cell is safe using the single point method. If the cell's number is equal to the number of flagged neighbours then the cell is classed as safe.
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell to check using single point.
        Returns:
        if the cell is safe. True if it matches single point and is safe, false otherwise.

      • isSinglePointMine

        private boolean isSinglePointMine(Cell cell)
        Checks if the cell is a mine using the single point method. If the cell's number is equal to the number of closed neighbours then the cell a mine.
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell to check using single point.
        Returns:
        if the cell is a mine. True if it matches single point and is a mine, false otherwise.

      • getSinglePointSafe

        private java.util.List<Cell> getSinglePointSafe(Cell cell)
        Fetch a list of all the safe cells surround a cell. Should only be called after isSinglePointSafe is checked.
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell to fetch the safe surround cells.
        Returns:
        the list of all safe cells surrounding the passed cell.

      • getSinglePointMine

        private java.util.List<Cell> getSinglePointMine(Cell cell)
        Fetch a list of all the mines surrounding a cell. Should only be called after isSinglePointMine is checked.
        Parameters:
        cell - the cell to fetch the surrounding mines.
        Returns:
        the list of all surrounding mines of the passed cell.
